review: I have a roku and wiiU. I bought the Apple TV bc I have the hboNow app. Easy to connect. Highly suggest googling the setup tutorials.The only cons I have are:There is no keyboard even in the app availableI can only watch Amazon Prime when I do AirPlay.Remote gets lost so easy. I suggest adding Velcro.
author: Amazon Customer "janetics"

review: Got this since we only have antenna (we refuse to pay the cable cable company's outrageous prices). It works far better than my Samsung blu-ray player and we can stream everything we could need through this Apple TV. We LOVE it. So far we use Netflix, HuluPlus, and HBO Now or Go. It's so nice being able to watch anything you want and at your convenience. The small size tucks neatly out of sight, too (size of your hand). Super easy set up was great. Get yourself Apple TV!
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's Apple..... it works just like it's supposed to.  BUT, it does not provide Amazon Prime programming.  See other reviews about how to circumvent this deficiency.

review: This unit was a replacement for an older model. It was easy to set up. You may have to unplug for 10 seconds to reset after automatic upgrades are downloaded. It works fast and well. Love it!
